module.name: Blacklist
module.description: This module is used to manage a system wide list of blocked callers
module.changelog: *15.0.2.8* FREEPBX-20389 Restoring backup into FreePBX 15 system is not flushing the previously existing blacklist entries. *15.0.2.7* fixing backup *15.0.2.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2.5* fixing legacy restore *15.0.2.4* FREEPBX-18905 Blacklist not working *15.0.2.3* FREEPBX-18905 Blacklist not working *15.0.2.2* FREEPBX-18352 Hook namespace issue *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Forked from 13.0.14.9 Implement Backup 15
